blocks.output:
setTimeout(function (){
  let editor = M.EDITOR
  let state = editor.state

  document.body.appendChild(create_button("prev", () => state.prev() ))
  document.body.appendChild(create_button("next", () => state.next() ))
  document.body.appendChild(create_button("save", () => state.save("test/save_file.json") ))


}, 200)
